aoaProcHWA DPU Internal Definitions
aoaProcHWA DPU Internal

The section has a list of all internal definitions which are used internally by the aoaProc DPU. More...

Macros

#define AOAHWA_2DFFT_SINGLE_BIN_INP_HWA_MEM_BANK   1
 2D-FFT single bin calculation - Input HWA memory bank index
 
#define AOAHWA_2DFFT_SINGLE_BIN_OUT_HWA_MEM_BANK   2
 2D-FFT single bin calculation - Output HWA memory bank index
 
#define AOAHWA_ANGLE_INP_HWA_MEM_BANK   0
 Angle FFT calculation - Input HWA memory bank index.
 
#define AOAHWA_ANGLE_AZIM_ABS_OUT_HWA_MEM_BANK   2
 Azimuth FFT calculation - Output (log2 magnitudes) HWA memory bank index.
 
#define AOAHWA_ANGLE_ELEV_CPLX_OUT_HWA_MEM_BANK   3
 Elevation FFT calculation - Output (Complex values) HWA memory bank index.
 
#define AOAHWA_ANGLE_AZIM_CPLX_OUT_HWA_MEM_BANK   1
 Azimuth FFT calculation - Output (Complex values) HWA memory bank index.
 
#define DPU_AOAPROCHWA_MAX_NUM_RX_VIRTUAL_ANTENNAS   (SYS_COMMON_NUM_TX_ANTENNAS * SYS_COMMON_NUM_RX_CHANNEL)
 Maximum number of receive virtual antennas.
 

Detailed Description

The section has a list of all internal definitions which are used internally by the aoaProc DPU.

HWA memory bank indices for various input/output operations
